targets.expr: tags.appname:blocky AND tags.host:$host AND " INFO queryLog: query resolved" | extract " INFO queryLog: query resolved <msg_logfmt>" | unpack_logfmt from msg_logfmt fields (client_ip, client_names,question_name,question_type,response_code,response_reason,response_type)| delete msg_logfmt

tags.appname:blocky AND tags.host:"moses.local.shiftsystems.net" AND " INFO queryLog: query resolved" | extract " INFO queryLog: query resolved <msg_logfmt>" | unpack_logfmt from msg_logfmt fields (client_ip, client_names,question_name,question_type,response_code,response_reason,response_type)| delete msg_logfmt | stats by (client_ip) count() requests | limit 10

tags.appname:blocky AND tags.host:"moses.local.shiftsystems.net" AND " INFO queryLog: query resolved" | extract " INFO queryLog: query resolved <msg_logfmt>" | unpack_logfmt from msg_logfmt fields (client_ip, client_names,question_name,question_type,response_code,response_reason,response_type)| delete msg_logfmt | stats by (question_name) count() requests | limit 10

tags.appname:blocky AND tags.host:"moses.local.shiftsystems.net" AND " INFO queryLog: query resolved" | extract " INFO queryLog: query resolved <msg_logfmt>" | unpack_logfmt from msg_logfmt fields (client_ip, client_names,question_name,question_type,response_code,response_reason,response_type)| delete msg_logfmt | response_reason:BLOCKED | stats by (client_ip) count() requests | limit 10

tags.appname:blocky AND tags.host:"moses.local.shiftsystems.net" AND " INFO queryLog: query resolved" | extract " INFO queryLog: query resolved <msg_logfmt>" | unpack_logfmt from msg_logfmt fields (client_ip, client_names,question_name,question_type,response_code,response_reason,response_type)| delete msg_logfmt | response_reason:BLOCKED | stats by (question_name) count() requests | limit 10
